title: Great studio in pet friendly building - 1461 Alice Street  #410
posting_body: ['1461 ALICE STREET #410 OAKLAND, CA', 'Open House:', 'Saturday - 10:00am to 11:00 am', '-- Hosted by Yohans Haftu', 'show contact info', 'Wednesday - 6:00pm to 7:00 pm', '-- Hosted by Farhad Mawazeb', 'show contact info', 'Appy now here: <URL>', 'Amenities', 'Hardwood Floor', 'Extra storage (1 closet)', 'Tile bathroom', 'Cable/internet ready', 'Floor length mirrored closet doors', 'Live in onsite managerli>', 'Details', 'Walk to Lake Merritt, Whole Foods, downtown and BART', 'Garbage, water, and heat included in rent', 'Laundry facilities on-site', 'Elevator in building', 'WE ♥ PETS!', 'Lease Terms', 'Two most recent bank statements', 'Two most recent pay stubs (or circle direct deposits on your bank statements)', 'Positive rental and credit history (minimum 600 credit score required)', 'Gross monthly income = 3 times the rent', 'Verifiable funds (bank balance)', '= 3 times the rent', "Lakewide Oakland CA is a seven minute walk from the Fremont - Richmond Richmond, the Pittsburg/Bay Point - SFIA/Millbrae San Francisco Int'l Airport and the Richmond - Daly City/Millbrae Millbrae at the 12th St. Oakland City Center stop.", 'This apartment is in the Lakewide neighborhood in Oakland.', 'Nearby parks include Snow Park, Lincoln Square and Madison Park.', 'Lakewide Oakland CA has a Walk Score of 94 out of 100.', "This location is a Walker's Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.", 'Nearby schools include Oasis High School, Envision Academy for Arts & Technology and Lighthouse Community Charter School.', "The closest grocery stores are Hien's Market, Lakeside Market and Nature's Best Foods.", 'Nearby coffee shops include Fresh & Best II, Brown Couch Cafe and mezz cafe.', 'There are 227 restaurants within a 15 minute walk including Cafe Juliet, Aria Grill & Cuisine and Chopstick Chinese Restaurant.', 'Lakewide Oakland CA is near Snow Park, Lincoln Square and Madison Square Park.', 'There are excellent bike lanes and the terrain is flat as a pancake.', 'Lakewide Oakland CA is very bikeable, biking is convenient for most trips.', 'Contact']
